title: Gemini CLI Settings
description: Configuration file schema for Gemini CLI settings. This schema enables IDE completion for `settings.json`.

$schema.title: Schema
$schema.description: The URL of the JSON schema for this settings file. Used by editors for validation and autocompletion.

mcpServers.title: MCP Servers
mcpServers.markdownDescription:
Configuration for MCP servers.

- Category: `Advanced`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `{}`

policyPaths.title: Policy Paths
policyPaths.description: Additional policy files or directories to load.
policyPaths.markdownDescription:
Additional policy files or directories to load.

- Category: `Advanced`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `[]`

general.title: General
general.markdownDescription:
General application settings.

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `{}`

preferredEditor.title: Preferred Editor
preferredEditor.description: The preferred editor to open files in.
preferredEditor.markdownDescription:
The preferred editor to open files in.

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`

vimMode.title: Vim Mode
vimMode.markdownDescription:
Enable Vim keybindings

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

defaultApprovalMode.title: Default Approval Mode
defaultApprovalMode.description: The default approval mode for tool execution. 'default' prompts for approval, 'auto_edit' auto-approves edit tools, and 'plan' is read-only mode. 'yolo' is not supported yet.
defaultApprovalMode.markdownDescription:
The default approval mode for tool execution. 'default' prompts for approval, 'auto_edit' auto-approves edit tools, and 'plan' is read-only mode. 'yolo' is not supported yet.

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `default`

devtools.title: DevTools
devtools.markdownDescription:
Enable DevTools inspector on launch.

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

enableAutoUpdate.title: Enable Auto Update
enableAutoUpdate.markdownDescription:
Enable automatic updates.

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `true`

enableAutoUpdateNotification.title: Enable Auto Update Notification
enableAutoUpdateNotification.markdownDescription:
Enable update notification prompts.

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `true`

checkpointing.title: Checkpointing
checkpointing.markdownDescription:
Session checkpointing settings.

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `{}`

enabled.title: Enable Checkpointing
enabled.markdownDescription:
Enable session checkpointing for recovery

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `false`

enablePromptCompletion.title: Enable Prompt Completion
enablePromptCompletion.description: Enable AI-powered prompt completion suggestions while typing.
enablePromptCompletion.markdownDescription:
Enable AI-powered prompt completion suggestions while typing.

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `false`

retryFetchErrors.title: Retry Fetch Errors
retryFetchErrors.description: Retry on "exception TypeError: fetch failed sending request" errors.
retryFetchErrors.markdownDescription:
Retry on "exception TypeError: fetch failed sending request" errors.

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

debugKeystrokeLogging.title: Debug Keystroke Logging
debugKeystrokeLogging.description: Enable debug logging of keystrokes to the console.
debugKeystrokeLogging.markdownDescription:
Enable debug logging of keystrokes to the console.

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

sessionRetention.title: Session Retention
sessionRetention.markdownDescription:
Settings for automatic session cleanup.

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`

enabled.title: Enable Session Cleanup
enabled.markdownDescription:
Enable automatic session cleanup

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

maxAge.title: Keep chat history
maxAge.description: Automatically delete chats older than this time period (e.g., "30d", "7d", "24h", "1w")
maxAge.markdownDescription:
Automatically delete chats older than this time period (e.g., "30d", "7d", "24h", "1w")

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`

maxCount.title: Max Session Count
maxCount.description: Alternative: Maximum number of sessions to keep (most recent)
maxCount.markdownDescription:
Alternative: Maximum number of sessions to keep (most recent)

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`

minRetention.title: Min Retention Period
minRetention.description: Minimum retention period (safety limit, defaults to "1d")
minRetention.markdownDescription:
Minimum retention period (safety limit, defaults to "1d")

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `1d`

warningAcknowledged.title: Warning Acknowledged
warningAcknowledged.description: INTERNAL: Whether the user has acknowledged the session retention warning
warningAcknowledged.markdownDescription:
INTERNAL: Whether the user has acknowledged the session retention warning

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

output.title: Output
output.markdownDescription:
Settings for the CLI output.

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `{}`

format.title: Output Format
format.description: The format of the CLI output. Can be `text` or `json`.
format.markdownDescription:
The format of the CLI output. Can be `text` or `json`.

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `text`

ui.title: UI
ui.markdownDescription:
User interface settings.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `{}`

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: The color theme for the UI. See the CLI themes guide for available options.
theme.markdownDescription:
The color theme for the UI. See the CLI themes guide for available options.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`

autoThemeSwitching.title: Auto Theme Switching
autoThemeSwitching.description: Automatically switch between default light and dark themes based on terminal background color.
autoThemeSwitching.markdownDescription:
Automatically switch between default light and dark themes based on terminal background color.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `true`

terminalBackgroundPollingInterval.title: Terminal Background Polling Interval
terminalBackgroundPollingInterval.description: Interval in seconds to poll the terminal background color.
terminalBackgroundPollingInterval.markdownDescription:
Interval in seconds to poll the terminal background color.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `60`

customThemes.title: Custom Themes
customThemes.markdownDescription:
Custom theme definitions.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `{}`

hideWindowTitle.title: Hide Window Title
hideWindowTitle.markdownDescription:
Hide the window title bar

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `false`

inlineThinkingMode.title: Inline Thinking
inlineThinkingMode.description: Display model thinking inline: off or full.
inlineThinkingMode.markdownDescription:
Display model thinking inline: off or full.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `off`

showStatusInTitle.title: Show Thoughts in Title
showStatusInTitle.description: Show Gemini CLI model thoughts in the terminal window title during the working phase
showStatusInTitle.markdownDescription:
Show Gemini CLI model thoughts in the terminal window title during the working phase

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

dynamicWindowTitle.title: Dynamic Window Title
dynamicWindowTitle.description: Update the terminal window title with current status icons (Ready: ◇, Action Required: ✋, Working: ✦)
dynamicWindowTitle.markdownDescription:
Update the terminal window title with current status icons (Ready: ◇, Action Required: ✋, Working: ✦)

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `true`

showHomeDirectoryWarning.title: Show Home Directory Warning
showHomeDirectoryWarning.description: Show a warning when running Gemini CLI in the home directory.
showHomeDirectoryWarning.markdownDescription:
Show a warning when running Gemini CLI in the home directory.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `true`

hideTips.title: Hide Tips
hideTips.description: Hide helpful tips in the UI
hideTips.markdownDescription:
Hide helpful tips in the UI

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

showShortcutsHint.title: Show Shortcuts Hint
showShortcutsHint.description: Show the "? for shortcuts" hint above the input.
showShortcutsHint.markdownDescription:
Show the "? for shortcuts" hint above the input.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `true`

hideBanner.title: Hide Banner
hideBanner.markdownDescription:
Hide the application banner

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

hideContextSummary.title: Hide Context Summary
hideContextSummary.description: Hide the context summary (GEMINI.md, MCP servers) above the input.
hideContextSummary.markdownDescription:
Hide the context summary (GEMINI.md, MCP servers) above the input.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

footer.title: Footer
footer.markdownDescription:
Settings for the footer.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `{}`

hideCWD.title: Hide CWD
hideCWD.description: Hide the current working directory path in the footer.
hideCWD.markdownDescription:
Hide the current working directory path in the footer.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

hideSandboxStatus.title: Hide Sandbox Status
hideSandboxStatus.description: Hide the sandbox status indicator in the footer.
hideSandboxStatus.markdownDescription:
Hide the sandbox status indicator in the footer.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

hideModelInfo.title: Hide Model Info
hideModelInfo.description: Hide the model name and context usage in the footer.
hideModelInfo.markdownDescription:
Hide the model name and context usage in the footer.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

hideContextPercentage.title: Hide Context Window Percentage
hideContextPercentage.description: Hides the context window remaining percentage.
hideContextPercentage.markdownDescription:
Hides the context window remaining percentage.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `true`

hideFooter.title: Hide Footer
hideFooter.description: Hide the footer from the UI
hideFooter.markdownDescription:
Hide the footer from the UI

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

showMemoryUsage.title: Show Memory Usage
showMemoryUsage.description: Display memory usage information in the UI
showMemoryUsage.markdownDescription:
Display memory usage information in the UI

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

showLineNumbers.title: Show Line Numbers
showLineNumbers.description: Show line numbers in the chat.
showLineNumbers.markdownDescription:
Show line numbers in the chat.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `true`

showCitations.title: Show Citations
showCitations.description: Show citations for generated text in the chat.
showCitations.markdownDescription:
Show citations for generated text in the chat.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

showModelInfoInChat.title: Show Model Info In Chat
showModelInfoInChat.description: Show the model name in the chat for each model turn.
showModelInfoInChat.markdownDescription:
Show the model name in the chat for each model turn.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

showUserIdentity.title: Show User Identity
showUserIdentity.description: Show the logged-in user's identity (e.g. email) in the UI.
showUserIdentity.markdownDescription:
Show the logged-in user's identity (e.g. email) in the UI.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `true`

useAlternateBuffer.title: Use Alternate Screen Buffer
useAlternateBuffer.description: Use an alternate screen buffer for the UI, preserving shell history.
useAlternateBuffer.markdownDescription:
Use an alternate screen buffer for the UI, preserving shell history.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `false`

useBackgroundColor.title: Use Background Color
useBackgroundColor.description: Whether to use background colors in the UI.
useBackgroundColor.markdownDescription:
Whether to use background colors in the UI.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `true`

incrementalRendering.title: Incremental Rendering
incrementalRendering.description: Enable incremental rendering for the UI. This option will reduce flickering but may cause rendering artifacts. Only supported when useAlternateBuffer is enabled.
incrementalRendering.markdownDescription:
Enable incremental rendering for the UI. This option will reduce flickering but may cause rendering artifacts. Only supported when useAlternateBuffer is enabled.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `true`

showSpinner.title: Show Spinner
showSpinner.markdownDescription:
Show the spinner during operations.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `true`

customWittyPhrases.title: Custom Witty Phrases
customWittyPhrases.description: Custom witty phrases to display during loading. When provided, the CLI cycles through these instead of the defaults.
customWittyPhrases.markdownDescription:
Custom witty phrases to display during loading. When provided, the CLI cycles through these instead of the defaults.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `[]`

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.markdownDescription:
Accessibility settings.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `{}`

enableLoadingPhrases.title: Enable Loading Phrases
enableLoadingPhrases.markdownDescription:
Enable loading phrases during operations.

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `true`

screenReader.title: Screen Reader Mode
screenReader.description: Render output in plain-text to be more screen reader accessible
screenReader.markdownDescription:
Render output in plain-text to be more screen reader accessible

- Category: `UI`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `false`

ide.title: IDE
ide.markdownDescription:
IDE integration settings.

- Category: `IDE`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `{}`

enabled.title: IDE Mode
enabled.markdownDescription:
Enable IDE integration mode.

- Category: `IDE`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `false`

hasSeenNudge.title: Has Seen IDE Integration Nudge
hasSeenNudge.description: Whether the user has seen the IDE integration nudge.
hasSeenNudge.markdownDescription:
Whether the user has seen the IDE integration nudge.

- Category: `IDE`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.markdownDescription:
Privacy-related settings.

- Category: `Privacy`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `{}`

usageStatisticsEnabled.title: Enable Usage Statistics
usageStatisticsEnabled.markdownDescription:
Enable collection of usage statistics

- Category: `Privacy`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `true`

model.title: Model
model.description: Settings related to the generative model.
model.markdownDescription:
Settings related to the generative model.

- Category: `Model`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `{}`

name.title: Model
name.description: The Gemini model to use for conversations.
name.markdownDescription:
The Gemini model to use for conversations.

- Category: `Model`
- Requires restart: `no`

maxSessionTurns.title: Max Session Turns
maxSessionTurns.description: Maximum number of user/model/tool turns to keep in a session. -1 means unlimited.
maxSessionTurns.markdownDescription:
Maximum number of user/model/tool turns to keep in a session. -1 means unlimited.

- Category: `Model`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `-1`

summarizeToolOutput.title: Summarize Tool Output
summarizeToolOutput.description: Enables or disables summarization of tool output. Configure per-tool token budgets (for example {"run_shell_command": {"tokenBudget": 2000}}). Currently only the run_shell_command tool supports summarization.
summarizeToolOutput.markdownDescription:
Enables or disables summarization of tool output. Configure per-tool token budgets (for example {"run_shell_command": {"tokenBudget": 2000}}). Currently only the run_shell_command tool supports summarization.

- Category: `Model`
- Requires restart: `no`

compressionThreshold.title: Compression Threshold
compressionThreshold.description: The fraction of context usage at which to trigger context compression (e.g. 0.2, 0.3).
compressionThreshold.markdownDescription:
The fraction of context usage at which to trigger context compression (e.g. 0.2, 0.3).

- Category: `Model`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `0.5`

disableLoopDetection.title: Disable Loop Detection
disableLoopDetection.description: Disable automatic detection and prevention of infinite loops.
disableLoopDetection.markdownDescription:
Disable automatic detection and prevention of infinite loops.

- Category: `Model`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `false`

skipNextSpeakerCheck.title: Skip Next Speaker Check
skipNextSpeakerCheck.markdownDescription:
Skip the next speaker check.

- Category: `Model`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `true`

modelConfigs.title: Model Configs

aliases.title: Model Config Aliases
aliases.description: Named presets for model configs. Can be used in place of a model name and can inherit from other aliases using an `extends` property.

customAliases.title: Custom Model Config Aliases
customAliases.description: Custom named presets for model configs. These are merged with (and override) the built-in aliases.
customAliases.markdownDescription:
Custom named presets for model configs. These are merged with (and override) the built-in aliases.

- Category: `Model`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `{}`

customOverrides.title: Custom Model Config Overrides
customOverrides.description: Custom model config overrides. These are merged with (and added to) the built-in overrides.
customOverrides.markdownDescription:
Custom model config overrides. These are merged with (and added to) the built-in overrides.

- Category: `Model`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `[]`

overrides.title: Model Config Overrides
overrides.description: Apply specific configuration overrides based on matches, with a primary key of model (or alias). The most specific match will be used.
overrides.markdownDescription:
Apply specific configuration overrides based on matches, with a primary key of model (or alias). The most specific match will be used.

- Category: `Model`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `[]`

agents.title: Agents
agents.markdownDescription:
Settings for subagents.

- Category: `Advanced`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `{}`

overrides.title: Agent Overrides
overrides.description: Override settings for specific agents, e.g. to disable the agent, set a custom model config, or run config.
overrides.markdownDescription:
Override settings for specific agents, e.g. to disable the agent, set a custom model config, or run config.

- Category: `Advanced`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `{}`

context.title: Context
context.description: Settings for managing context provided to the model.
context.markdownDescription:
Settings for managing context provided to the model.

- Category: `Context`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `{}`

fileName.title: Context File Name
fileName.description: The name of the context file or files to load into memory. Accepts either a single string or an array of strings.
fileName.markdownDescription:
The name of the context file or files to load into memory. Accepts either a single string or an array of strings.

- Category: `Context`
- Requires restart: `no`

importFormat.title: Memory Import Format
importFormat.description: The format to use when importing memory.
importFormat.markdownDescription:
The format to use when importing memory.

- Category: `Context`
- Requires restart: `no`

discoveryMaxDirs.title: Memory Discovery Max Dirs
discoveryMaxDirs.description: Maximum number of directories to search for memory.
discoveryMaxDirs.markdownDescription:
Maximum number of directories to search for memory.

- Category: `Context`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `200`

includeDirectories.title: Include Directories
includeDirectories.description: Additional directories to include in the workspace context. Missing directories will be skipped with a warning.
includeDirectories.markdownDescription:
Additional directories to include in the workspace context. Missing directories will be skipped with a warning.

- Category: `Context`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `[]`

loadMemoryFromIncludeDirectories.title: Load Memory From Include Directories
loadMemoryFromIncludeDirectories.description: Controls how /memory refresh loads GEMINI.md files. When true, include directories are scanned; when false, only the current directory is used.
loadMemoryFromIncludeDirectories.markdownDescription:
Controls how /memory refresh loads GEMINI.md files. When true, include directories are scanned; when false, only the current directory is used.

- Category: `Context`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

fileFiltering.title: File Filtering
fileFiltering.markdownDescription:
Settings for git-aware file filtering.

- Category: `Context`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `{}`

respectGitIgnore.title: Respect .gitignore
respectGitIgnore.markdownDescription:
Respect .gitignore files when searching.

- Category: `Context`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `true`

respectGeminiIgnore.title: Respect .geminiignore
respectGeminiIgnore.markdownDescription:
Respect .geminiignore files when searching.

- Category: `Context`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `true`

enableRecursiveFileSearch.title: Enable Recursive File Search
enableRecursiveFileSearch.description: Enable recursive file search functionality when completing @ references in the prompt.
enableRecursiveFileSearch.markdownDescription:
Enable recursive file search functionality when completing @ references in the prompt.

- Category: `Context`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `true`

enableFuzzySearch.title: Enable Fuzzy Search
enableFuzzySearch.description: Enable fuzzy search when searching for files.
enableFuzzySearch.markdownDescription:
Enable fuzzy search when searching for files.

- Category: `Context`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `true`

customIgnoreFilePaths.title: Custom Ignore File Paths
customIgnoreFilePaths.description: Additional ignore file paths to respect. These files take precedence over .geminiignore and .gitignore. Files earlier in the array take precedence over files later in the array, e.g. the first file takes precedence over the second one.
customIgnoreFilePaths.markdownDescription:
Additional ignore file paths to respect. These files take precedence over .geminiignore and .gitignore. Files earlier in the array take precedence over files later in the array, e.g. the first file takes precedence over the second one.

- Category: `Context`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `[]`

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Settings for built-in and custom tools.
tools.markdownDescription:
Settings for built-in and custom tools.

- Category: `Tools`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `{}`

sandbox.title: Sandbox
sandbox.description: Sandbox execution environment. Set to a boolean to enable or disable the sandbox, or provide a string path to a sandbox profile.
sandbox.markdownDescription:
Sandbox execution environment. Set to a boolean to enable or disable the sandbox, or provide a string path to a sandbox profile.

- Category: `Tools`
- Requires restart: `yes`

shell.title: Shell
shell.markdownDescription:
Settings for shell execution.

- Category: `Tools`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `{}`

enableInteractiveShell.title: Enable Interactive Shell
enableInteractiveShell.description: Use node-pty for an interactive shell experience. Fallback to child_process still applies.
enableInteractiveShell.markdownDescription:
Use node-pty for an interactive shell experience. Fallback to child_process still applies.

- Category: `Tools`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `true`

pager.title: Pager
pager.description: The pager command to use for shell output. Defaults to `cat`.
pager.markdownDescription:
The pager command to use for shell output. Defaults to `cat`.

- Category: `Tools`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `cat`

showColor.title: Show Color
showColor.markdownDescription:
Show color in shell output.

- Category: `Tools`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `false`

inactivityTimeout.title: Inactivity Timeout
inactivityTimeout.description: The maximum time in seconds allowed without output from the shell command. Defaults to 5 minutes.
inactivityTimeout.markdownDescription:
The maximum time in seconds allowed without output from the shell command. Defaults to 5 minutes.

- Category: `Tools`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `300`

enableShellOutputEfficiency.title: Enable Shell Output Efficiency
enableShellOutputEfficiency.description: Enable shell output efficiency optimizations for better performance.
enableShellOutputEfficiency.markdownDescription:
Enable shell output efficiency optimizations for better performance.

- Category: `Tools`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `true`

core.title: Core Tools
core.description: Restrict the set of built-in tools with an allowlist. Match semantics mirror tools.allowed; see the built-in tools documentation for available names.
core.markdownDescription:
Restrict the set of built-in tools with an allowlist. Match semantics mirror tools.allowed; see the built-in tools documentation for available names.

- Category: `Tools`
- Requires restart: `yes`

allowed.title: Allowed Tools
allowed.description: Tool names that bypass the confirmation dialog. Useful for trusted commands (for example ["run_shell_command(git)", "run_shell_command(npm test)"]). See shell tool command restrictions for matching details.
allowed.markdownDescription:
Tool names that bypass the confirmation dialog. Useful for trusted commands (for example ["run_shell_command(git)", "run_shell_command(npm test)"]). See shell tool command restrictions for matching details.

- Category: `Advanced`
- Requires restart: `yes`

exclude.title: Exclude Tools
exclude.description: Tool names to exclude from discovery.
exclude.markdownDescription:
Tool names to exclude from discovery.

- Category: `Tools`
- Requires restart: `yes`

discoveryCommand.title: Tool Discovery Command
discoveryCommand.description: Command to run for tool discovery.
discoveryCommand.markdownDescription:
Command to run for tool discovery.

- Category: `Tools`
- Requires restart: `yes`

callCommand.title: Tool Call Command
callCommand.description: Defines a custom shell command for invoking discovered tools. The command must take the tool name as the first argument, read JSON arguments from stdin, and emit JSON results on stdout.
callCommand.markdownDescription:
Defines a custom shell command for invoking discovered tools. The command must take the tool name as the first argument, read JSON arguments from stdin, and emit JSON results on stdout.

- Category: `Tools`
- Requires restart: `yes`

useRipgrep.title: Use Ripgrep
useRipgrep.description: Use ripgrep for file content search instead of the fallback implementation. Provides faster search performance.
useRipgrep.markdownDescription:
Use ripgrep for file content search instead of the fallback implementation. Provides faster search performance.

- Category: `Tools`
- Requires restart: `no`
- Default: `true`

truncateToolOutputThreshold.title: Tool Output Truncation Threshold
truncateToolOutputThreshold.description: Maximum characters to show when truncating large tool outputs. Set to 0 or negative to disable truncation.
truncateToolOutputThreshold.markdownDescription:
Maximum characters to show when truncating large tool outputs. Set to 0 or negative to disable truncation.

- Category: `General`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `40000`

disableLLMCorrection.title: Disable LLM Correction
disableLLMCorrection.description: Disable LLM-based error correction for edit tools. When enabled, tools will fail immediately if exact string matches are not found, instead of attempting to self-correct.
disableLLMCorrection.markdownDescription:
Disable LLM-based error correction for edit tools. When enabled, tools will fail immediately if exact string matches are not found, instead of attempting to self-correct.

- Category: `Tools`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `true`

mcp.title: MCP
mcp.description: Settings for Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers.
mcp.markdownDescription:
Settings for Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers.

- Category: `MCP`
- Requires restart: `yes`
- Default: `{}`

serverCommand.title: MCP Server Command
serverCommand.description: Command to start an MCP server.
serverCommand.markdownDescription:
Command to start an MCP server.

MCPServerConfig.description: Definition of a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server configuration.

args.description: Command-line arguments for the stdio transport command.

env.description: Environment variables to set for the server process.

cwd.description: Working directory for the server process.

url.description: URL for SSE or HTTP transport. Use with "type" field to specify transport type.

headers.description: Additional HTTP headers sent to the server.

type.description: Transport type. Use "stdio" for local command, "sse" for Server-Sent Events, or "http" for Streamable HTTP.

timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for MCP requests.

trust.description: Marks the server as trusted. Trusted servers may gain additional capabilities.

includeTools.description: Subset of tools that should be enabled for this server. When omitted all tools are enabled.

excludeTools.description: Tools that should be disabled for this server even if exposed.

extension.description: Metadata describing the Gemini CLI extension that owns this MCP server.

oauth.description: OAuth configuration for authenticating with the server.

authProviderType.description: Authentication provider used for acquiring credentials (for example `dynamic_discovery`).

logPrompts.description: Whether prompts are logged in telemetry payloads.

outfile.description: File path for writing telemetry output.

useCollector.description: Whether to forward telemetry to an OTLP collector.

useCliAuth.description: Whether to use CLI authentication for telemetry (only for in-process exporters).

BugCommandSettings.description: Configuration for the bug report helper command.

urlTemplate.description: Template used to open a bug report URL. Variables in the template are populated at runtime.

SummarizeToolOutputSettings.description: Controls summarization behavior for individual tools. All properties are optional.

tokenBudget.description: Maximum number of tokens used when summarizing tool output.

AgentOverride.description: Override settings for a specific agent.

maxTimeMinutes.description: The maximum execution time for the agent in minutes.

maxTurns.description: The maximum number of conversational turns.

CustomTheme.description: Custom theme definition used for styling Gemini CLI output. Colors are provided as hex strings or named ANSI colors.

StringOrStringArray.description: Accepts either a single string or an array of strings.

BooleanOrString.description: Accepts either a boolean flag or a string command name.

HookDefinitionArray.description: Array of hook definition objects for a specific event.

items.description: Hook definition specifying matcher pattern and hook configurations.

matcher.description: Pattern to match against the event context (tool name, notification type, etc.). Supports exact match, regex (/pattern/), and wildcards (*).

hooks.description: Hooks to execute when the matcher matches.

command.description: Shell command to execute. Receives JSON input via stdin and returns JSON output via stdout.

timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for hook execution.
